_source.short_desc: Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants.
_source.long_desc: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe Connect web conferencing software. Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants - all using a web browser and the Adobe Flash Player runtime, already installed on 98% of Internet-connected personal computers.
_source.target_audience: Designed for all size corporations and government agencies worldwide to improve collaboration, webinars, and eLearning through exceptionally rich interactions

category_features.name: Built-in Course Authoring
category_features.definition: Tools that allow you to create and publish courses and course material/content

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Social Learning
category_features.definition: Create tools to promote social interaction and learning between students/trainees and instructors/trainers

category_features.name: Virtual Classroom
category_features.definition: Classes/sessions accessible via web browser of built-in video conferencing

related_products.short_desc: Free online learning management system, providing educators around the world with an open source solution for e-learning.
related_products.features: Improve your teaching and learner outcomes with Moodle LMS, the customisable open source learning management system used by over 300 million people in over 100 languages worldwide. Our feature-rich platform is secure and scalable, integrates seamlessly with third-party platforms and plugins, and allows teachers to create engaging, accessible and active learning experiences.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based HCM platform bringing together payroll, time + attendance, and HR for organisations with between 500 and 50,000 employees.
related_products.features: Dayforce is a global HCM platform that transforms the employee experience. It unifies data from across the entire employee lifecycle to enable better decision-making at every level. Dayforce is a comprehensive cloud platform that combines HR, payroll, workforce management and talent management in a single application. Our scalable platform is built with a single, flexible rules engine combined with real-time updates and calculations that help address complex regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LXP that delivers a personalized learning experience at scale.
related_products.features:
Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LMS that is responsive and format-agnostic in content delivery. Reduce skill gaps to manage a learner ecosystem that is engaged, compliant and updated. Experience a world-class enterprise LMS from Adobe that is: 
1. Recognized by leading analysts and industry bodies 
2. Awarded for excellence across multiple categories 
3. Adopted by leading corporations around the world 
4. Used by millions of engaged learners

related_products.short_desc: Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, TalentLMS helps companies offer mobile training that's accessible anytime and anywhere.
related_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams actually embrace training. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide training for any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. And with the TalentLMS mobile app (available on iOS and Android), training is finally accessible anytime and anywhere.

related_products.short_desc: The all-in-one knowledge and training app that makes it easy to train and grow your team. Get your business out of your brain today.
related_products.features: Trainual is a knowledge transfer and training platform where growing teams build the playbook for how they do what they do. With Trainual, every process, policy, and procedure for all the roles and responsibilities in your business are easily documented, organized, assignable, and searchable. The result is faster onboarding and training, more seamless delegation, consistent processes as you scale, increased accountability, and everybody stays in-the-know with your need-to-knows.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training is designed to make learning content equally engaging whether accessed via a mobile or desktop environment.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training is a powerful but easy-to-use LMS designed to make content equally engaging whether accessed via a mobile or desktop environment. Learning professionals do not need to take time-consuming extra steps to convert content to mobile. Courses created using the built-in Content Author are automatically mobile-responsive as is content curated from the SAP Litmos Training Content library. From the learner side, they can train on-the-go, anytime from their mobile device of choice.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one system of learning that brings together learning, growth, skills, and capabilities into a personalized, curated experience.
related_products.features: Cornerstone Learning is learning management software (LMS) that enables companies to provide a wide variety of media-rich training courses and curricula to employees. Testing and assessments are accessible through employee portals. The LMS is mobile-friendly, making learning self-directed and available 24/7. Training helps employees stay certified, compliant, and ready to expand their skill sets. Learning opportunities have a positive impact on employee engagement and organizational performance.

related_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
related_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 Education App on the App store (2019) providing personalized learning to improve English speaking skills.
related_products.features:
#1 Education App on the App Store (2019) that helps learners improve English speaking skills. ELSA is fully mobile and staff/students can learn anywhere, anytime. Practice real-life conversations with 6,000+ exercises, 120+ topics on business, daily life, travel, school & interview skills. 

Industry-specific modules for Airlines, Hospitality, Banks, Healthcare, IT/BPO and more. Trusted by 25M+ users, 400+ organizations to improve staff communication, productivity and customer service.

related_products.short_desc: Lessonly by Seismic is training software used by over 3 million learners and 1000 companies to learn, practice and do better work.
related_products.features: Lessonly by Seismic is powerfully simple learning management software that helps teams learn, practice and do better work. We are used by over 3 million learners at more than 1000 leading companies including Jostens, and U.S. Cellular to share knowledge and reinforce best practices. Not to mention increasing productivity and cutting onboarding time in half. Other features include: easy-to-use lesson creation, insights to track metrics & coaching functionality to give feedback at scale.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile learning can take place anytime, anywhere with the intuitive LMS365 Mobile App.
similar_products.features: LMS365 aims to empower organizations in the modern digital workplace through learning. With over 4 million users in 60+ countries globally, it is the only cloud-based learning platform built into Microsoft 365. With its seamless integration with the host of Microsoft's modern workplace tools, LMS365  is an all-in-one integrated learning solution for the digital age. And with the LMS365 Mobile App, mobile learning can take place anytime, anywhere.

similar_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
similar_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

similar_products.short_desc: The all-in-one knowledge and training app that makes it easy to train and grow your team. Get your business out of your brain today.
similar_products.features: Trainual is a knowledge transfer and training platform where growing teams build the playbook for how they do what they do. With Trainual, every process, policy, and procedure for all the roles and responsibilities in your business are easily documented, organized, assignable, and searchable. The result is faster onboarding and training, more seamless delegation, consistent processes as you scale, increased accountability, and everybody stays in-the-know with your need-to-knows.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet TalentCards: the mobile learning platform built to train deskless employees. Build courses online and deliver them on smartphones.
similar_products.features:
Meet TalentCards, the mobile learning app that puts training in your people's hands, no matter where they are in the world. Unlike traditional LMSs and training software, TalentCards is built for mobile, frontline, and deskless employees- people whose jobs keep them on the move.

Build powerful microlearning courses online and deliver them straight to your team's smartphones. Deliver training on safety, compliance, sales, product info, soft skills, and more, without interrupting the work day.

similar_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
similar_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: PlayerLync's mobile-first content management platform combines learning, daily operations and communications into one, easy to use app.
similar_products.features: PlayerLync is a mobile workforce enablement platform that helps companies like Starbucks, Noodles & Co., and Wingstop to ensure that every frontline employee has the personalized and timely information they need to do their job, delivered automatically through their mobile device.

similar_products.short_desc: SAP Litmos Training is designed to make learning content equally engaging whether accessed via a mobile or desktop environment.
similar_products.features: SAP Litmos Training is a powerful but easy-to-use LMS designed to make content equally engaging whether accessed via a mobile or desktop environment. Learning professionals do not need to take time-consuming extra steps to convert content to mobile. Courses created using the built-in Content Author are automatically mobile-responsive as is content curated from the SAP Litmos Training Content library. From the learner side, they can train on-the-go, anytime from their mobile device of choice.

similar_products.short_desc: HSI is the leader in safety training, workforce development content, and compliance solutions.
similar_products.features:
HSI is the leader in safety training, workforce development content, and compliance solutions. 

Our combination of technology and content solutions helps Safety, HR, and Operations leaders train and develop their workforce, keep workers safe and meet regulatory and operational compliance requirements. 

From safety training and management and compliance, HSI has solutions for businesses of all sizes, across all industry types.

similar_products.short_desc: Access training, development, & certification from any device. This mobile learning software allows you to remain compliant on the go.
similar_products.features:
Improve your operations and manage your workforce from anywhere and at any time. Seertech's mobile learning software allows you to manage your workforce and deliver training, development, and certification on the go.

Suitable for enterprise businesses with critical training & compliance needs, your people will get access to virtualized learning, AI-based recommendations, continuing education, personal development, high stakes certification - online, offline, and on any device.

similar_products.short_desc: LearnWorlds' easy-to-use white-label solution that helps you build your own mobile app for iOS & Android without a single line of code.
similar_products.features: LearnWorlds' powerful, simple and intuitive Mobile App Builder offers a white-label mobile app solution that shapes the path of future mobile education. Take learning to the next level with zero coding skills needed and create your own branded mobile app for iOS and Android to make your academy stand out. Harness the power of mobile to scale your business by selling & upselling through the mobile app. Expand your reach by meeting your learners wherever they are and boost their engagement.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use cloud-based LMS 100% integrated with a robust authoring tool. Launch your eLearning in just one day with a minimum of fuss!
similar_products.features: iSpring Learn is a fast LMS with a powerful authoring tool. With iSpring, you can easily launch onboarding or continuous learning in your company, and train employees no matter where they are. Native iOS & Android apps enable learners to get instant access to courses, even offline. Account owners get great value at a reasonable price. Personal live tech support is at your fingertips. Schedule a free 15-minute online meeting to learn how iSpring Learn works for your mission-critical project.

similar_products.short_desc: Over 1,300 L&D teams around the world partner with LearnUpon LMS to execute their learning strategy and hit their learning goals.
similar_products.features:
At LearnUpon LMS we're on a mission to help you unlock the power of learning. Combining our award winning LMS and our industry-leading Customer Experience team, we pride ourselves on being a trusted partner to over 1,300 businesses.

Every day, L&D teams around the world choose LearnUpon's intuitive, feature-rich and deeply integrate-able platform to deliver a connected learning experience to millions of learners across their employees, customers and partners. Plans start at $15,000 USD.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, TalentLMS helps companies offer mobile training that's accessible anytime and anywhere.
similar_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams actually embrace training. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide training for any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. And with the TalentLMS mobile app (available on iOS and Android), training is finally accessible anytime and anywhere.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Experience Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Experience Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Experience Platforms (LEP) allow organizations to consolidate diverse training resources into a single place and provide personalized learning paths and experiences for each trainee.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Management Systems (LMS) on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Management Systems (LMS) and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Management Systems (LMS) provide a framework through which learning content is delivered and managed. An LMS allows for an anytime, anywhere learning environment, delivering and tracking eLearning courses and testing. A Learning Content Management System (LCMS) enables the organization to learn content from Courseware authoring tools and presentation of the content to students. Learning Management Systems are related to Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Training software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Training tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Training software, also known as eLearning or Computer-Based Training (CBT) software, automates educational activities for students and/or corporate employees. Training solutions are often customizable based on the needs of specific organizations and include capabilities such as course registration and testing, certification tracking, conferencing, skills tracking, and reporting. Training applications may provide the framework for presenting classes, as well as an ecommerce functions, to allow for payments. Training software is related to Courseware and Learning Management Systems (LMS).

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across a multitude of systems.
related_products.features: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across everything from your mobile and desktop devices to telephones and conference room systems. Special features include cloud and local recording with transcripts and multi-user annotation capabilities via screen share.  Easy access with one click, chat across platforms and share files all with encrypted, compliant settings for extra security.

related_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
related_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Ridiculously simple screen sharing tool for meetings on the fly. Get everybody on the same page, when they're not in the same room!
related_products.features: join.me is the fastest and easiest way to connect and collaborate. Anyone can share ideas instantly with screen sharing, audio, video, whiteboard and chat. join.me is a personalized meeting experience where users can personalize participant bubbles, URLs, backgrounds and more!

related_products.short_desc: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing
related_products.features: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing. Designed for midsize to large businesses in consulting, finance, healthcare, and other industries, it is a web conferencing tool that provides team messaging, remote collaboration, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

similar_products.short_desc: ConveneAGM is the AGM solution that enables you to conduct virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings in compliance to existing guidelines.
similar_products.features: ConveneAGM is the end-to-end eAGM conference solution designed to conduct engaging virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings. Organizations can hold a real-time AGM broadcast where shareholders can register, vote on resolutions, send proxy forms, and participate in live Q&A. It streamlines the AGM process and requirements into an all-in-one platform to aid secretaries, scrutineers, and share registrars. ConveneAGM is developed by Azeus, a CMMI Level 5 company and an expert in process efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: TrainerCentral is an online course platform, with an in-build video conferencing functionality to host webinars and live workshops.
similar_products.features: Turn learning into a two-way street by simulating an in-person environment with a host of engagement features and tools. TrainerCentral's virtual classroom streams your training videos in HD, engaging your remote learners like you're standing right in front of them.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, simple, and secure co-browsing and collaboration technology that lets you upgrade any conversation, from any channel, seamlessly.
similar_products.features:
Surfly provides co-browsing and collaboration technology that lets you upgrade any conversation, from any channel, seamlessly, and support customers as if you are sitting side-by-side. 

Surfly is easily customized to fit any customer experience flow. You can launch co-browsing sessions directly from your site or platform and change look & feel so it matches your branding.

Surfly enhances interactions on your platform in real-time. Without writing a single line of code or installing software.

similar_products.short_desc: Glisser is an award-winning technology platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events.
similar_products.features:
Glisser is an award-winning platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events. We enable companies to power engaging event experiences by offering a ready-to-go event platform and a completely customizable solution that lets you take control of the look and feel of your virtual events.

Glisser Elements is our platform distilled down to its purest form. Our virtual and hybrid event Software Development Kits (SDKs) allow you to create unique virtual environments, inside your own websites.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size
similar_products.features: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size, from one-person firms to multinational enterprises. The web-based solution is easy to use and covers the entire webinar process from preparation to presentation, and from interaction to follow-up. The software requires no installation and works on all devices and operating systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
similar_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: BigMarker is the world's most customizable platform for webinars, virtual and hybrid events.
similar_products.features: BigMarker is a fully customizable virtual conference platform that combines powerful video technology with robust marketing and interactive experience capabilities to create unique branded virtual events.

similar_products.short_desc: A web conferencing solution that empowers you to host interactive online meeting, video conferencing and organize engaging webinars.
similar_products.features: Zoho Meeting is a robust web conferencing solution built for your online meeting and webinar needs. It is completely browser-based and attendees don't need to download any application to attend a meeting or webinar. Keep your meetings handy using the desktop plugin for Windows and Mac, iOS app, android app, Google Chrome extension, Firefox extension, embed widget and calendar integrations. Embed webinar registration, polls, Q&A, allow to talk, recording, in-depth analytics, etc

similar_products.short_desc: FreeConferenceCall.com offers HD audio conferencing and online meetings for up to 1,000 participants  all for free.
similar_products.features: FreeConferenceCall.com offers HD audio conferencing and online meetings with screen sharing and video conferencing for up to 1,000 participants. Hosting more than 40 million conferences annually, FreeConferenceCall.com has grown to become the largest and most recognized conferencing provider on the planet. Every account includes unlimited conference calls, screen sharing, video conferencing, recording, security features, calendar integrations, mobile applications and much more  all for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
similar_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use, feature-rich conferencing solution. Audio, video, screen sharing and much more with up to 1,000 participants.
similar_products.features:
Grow your business with a conferencing service that doesnt limit you the bigger you get, or restrict features to make you upgrade.

With StartMeeting we give you all the conferencing and online meeting features you need right off the bat, with up to 1,000 audio, web and video participants  all for a flat rate of $12.95 a month.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes. Bizzabo was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in New York and Tel-Aviv.

similar_products.short_desc: Jumbo is a fully integrated and customizable web conferencing and live streaming software tool.
similar_products.features: Jumbo builds the world's most customizable live streaming and video platforms. Our platforms are fully integrated and tailor made for your brand. Features include registration, ticketing, live chat, virtual breakout rooms, trivia, polls, and on-demand user data. Our full service event production team will assist you in crafting the pristine video content. Perfect for virtual events, fundraisers, online education, live streaming, hosting premium content, Learning Management System, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audio Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.description: Audio Conferencing software allows multiple people to dial in and join the same audio-only call. This type of software may also include live chat, call recording, video conferencing, and other features that enable online communication between remote teams, stakeholders, and customers.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.
